seed_pair.known: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
seed_pair.target: Él no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas están aquí.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 strict GATE compliance
changes_from_previous: Generated for S0034 with strict GATE compliance
Proper distribution: 2 short, 2 quite short, 2 longer, 4 long
All phrases use exact forms from taught LEGOs only

practice_phrases: she doesn't want to speak Spanish
he doesn't want to speak with me
he doesn't want to learn Spanish
she doesn't want to be able to speak with me
ella no quiere poder hablar conmigo
he doesn't want to meet people who speak Spanish
él no quiere encontrar personas que hablan español
she doesn't want to speak with me this evening
ella no quiere hablar conmigo esta noche
he doesn't want to show me what the answer is
él no quiere mostrarme cuál es la respuesta
S0034L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0033 LEGOs only

practice_phrases: he doesn't want to be quiet

S0034L02.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0034L01 LEGOs only. NOTE: 'estar silencioso' introduced in this LEGO.

practice_phrases: I want to speak when you speak
he doesn't want to be quiet when you speak
él no quiere estar silencioso cuando hablas
I wanted to be able to speak when you wanted to speak
quería poder hablar cuando querías hablar
he doesn't want to be quiet when you speak Spanish
él no quiere estar silencioso cuando hablas español
I like to speak Spanish when you speak with me
me gusta hablar español cuando hablas conmigo
I wanted to be quiet when you wanted to speak yesterday
quería estar silencioso cuando querías hablar ayer
S0034L03.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0034L02 LEGOs only. NOTE: 'cuando' introduced in this LEGO.

practice_phrases: I want to meet other people
he doesn't want to speak with other people
él no quiere hablar con otras personas
I want to meet other people today
I wanted to meet other people who speak Spanish
quería encontrar otras personas que hablan español
she doesn't want to be quiet when other people speak
ella no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas hablan
he doesn't want to meet other people this evening
él no quiere encontrar otras personas esta noche
I like to speak with other people who speak Spanish
me gusta hablar con otras personas que hablan español
S0034L04.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0034L03 LEGOs only. NOTE: 'otras personas' introduced in this LEGO.

practice_phrases: I want to speak when you are here
I want to speak Spanish when you are here
quiero hablar español cuando estás aquí
he doesn't want to be quiet when you are here
él no quiere estar silencioso cuando estás aquí
he doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here
él no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas están aquí
I wanted to meet other people when you are here
quería encontrar otras personas cuando estás aquí
he doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
él no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas están aquí.
S0034L05.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0034L04 LEGOs only. NOTE: 'están aquí' introduced in this LEGO.
